definitions: the quality of being based on or in accordance with reason or logic

examples.text: like any phobia, rationality plays only a small role

shortDefinitions: based on or in accordance with reason or logic

definitions: the quality of being able to think sensibly or logically

examples.text: Scott wanted to play the character with a bit more dignity and rationality

shortDefinitions: quality of being able to think sensibly or logically

definitions: the quality of being endowed with the capacity to reason

examples.text: we call rationality the distinction of man, when compared with other animals

shortDefinitions: quality of being endowed with capacity to reason

definitions: the property of a number, quantity, or expression of being expressible, or containing quantities which are expressible, as a ratio of whole numbers.
shortDefinitions: property of number or expression of being expressible as ratio of whole numbers
